mapper.select: select distinct camp_location from tbl_camp_location where camp_area = #{camp_area}
select * from(select rownum rnum, a.* from(select * from tbl_camp order by camp_no ASC) a) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select * from tbl_camp where camp_area = #{camp_area} and camp_location = #{camp_location}
select * from(select rownum rnum, a.* from(select * from tbl_review where review_admin = 0 order by review_no desc)a) where rnum between 1 and 5
select * from(select rownum rnum, a.* from(select * from tbl_notice where notice_admin = 0 order by notice_no desc)a) where rnum between 1 and 5
select * from(select rownum rnum, a.* from(select * from tbl_camping_tip where campingtip_admin = 0 order by CampingTip_no desc)a) where rnum between 1 and 5
select * from(select rownum rnum, a.* from(select * from tbl_faq where faq_admin = 0 order by faq_no desc)a) where rnum between 1 and 5
select * from(select rownum rnum, a.* from(select * from tbl_camp where camp_admin = 0 order by recommend desc)a) where rnum between 1 and 10
